overview: Pixie is cursed with turning into a Pterodactyl when her husband is caught messing with bones on an ancient burial ground. Her husband, children, friends, and neighbours must come to terms with Pixie's new "look". Her only chance to return to her normal state is to find the shaman who inflicted the curse on her.
tagline: A perfect Beverly Hills housewife by day - a prehistoric flying reptile by night.
title: Pterodactyl Woman from Beverly Hills
